definition: without advance preparation, with little or no preparation or forethought, an extemporaneous speech or remark
details:
adverb
- without advance preparation
= synonyms: ad lib
adjective
- with little or no preparation or forethought
= synonyms: offhand, offhanded, extempore, ad-lib, extemporaneous, extemporary, off-the-cuff, unrehearsed
noun
- an extemporaneous speech or remark
= example: an extemporaneous speech or remark
- a short musical passage that seems to have been made spontaneously without advance preparation
